title: Sin & Savage
description:
It's his world and his rules, he keeps telling her. 



But that doesn't mean she'll play along...

All small-town schoolteacher Tori Jones wants is a relaxing, long weekend to herself. But the plans go awry when her troublemaking grandmother confesses her secret Internet boyfriend has disappeared with her money.So the ladies fly to Las Vegas to track the crook down but land knee deep in a world filled with liars, criminals and outlaw bikers. They need help!
Enter Savage Monroe.
The dirty outlaw biker has a busy weekend planned, especially with that shipment of guns coming in. The last thing he needs is to play babysitter to some goody two-shoes schoolteacher who wants to hire him to be her bodyguard.But, he’s thunderstruck. She’s about the most beautiful thing he’s seen in a long time, and he’s attracted to the woman like gravity. Too bad she’s an infuriating, stubborn, pain-in-the-butt, who refuses to do what you tell her! Can he keep her safe from the rogues of the road?
The pair strike a deal.

And the danger-filled quest begins.
But can Tori trust the rough, tough biker? He comes from a different world and solves problems with his fists. Should she fight the crazy, insane pull she feels to the man?SIN & SAVAGE is a romantic suspense adventure that will take you on an emotional rollercoaster ride, this time on the back of an outlaw biker’s wild Harley through the dark, violent streets of Las Vegas. Live the book!
WARNING: VIOLENCE AND COARSE LANGUAGE
author: Anna Mara
